definition: to give as a present/to repel/to bestow an honorary title after death (old)
section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

sentences.english: Grilled Sculpin now correctly grants Ranged Attack Power.
sentences.chinese: 烤肉飯桶現在正確的贈款遠程攻擊力。

sentences.english: Highlight concern on and follow up over and under. ;
sentences.chinese: 重點關注贈款費用多花及花費不足。

sentences.english: This project, too, has a School Development Grants component.
sentences.chinese: 該項目也設有學校發展贈款子項目。

sentences.english: Some consist mainly of grants, which are free money.
sentences.chinese: 有些基本上是贈款，也就是全免費。

sentences.english: Prepare grant agreements in cooperation with the Program Associate and grantees .
sentences.chinese: 與項目副官和受贈組織協作完成贈款協議。

sentences.english: Donor support for reconstruction should be in the form of grants.
sentences.chinese: 捐款方應以贈款形式支持重建。
